data.html:
<style>

.v3_customer-logos-marquee-group {
  animation: marquee 75s linear infinite;
}

.v3_customer-logos-marquee-group.small {
  animation: marquee 140s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes marquee {
  0% {
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
  100% {
    transform: translateX(calc(-100% - 5rem));
  }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {

  
  .v3_customer-logos-marquee-wrapper:not(.small) .v3_customer-logos-marquee-group img {
    height: 1.125rem;
  }

}

</style>


<script>


// >> SOLUTIONS PAGE - SHOW RELEVANT LOGO GROUP BY URL PATH (Variant must be "Base")
const urlPathSegments = window.location.pathname.split("/").filter(segment => segment !== "");
const lastUrlPathSegment = urlPathSegments[urlPathSegments.length - 1];

switch(lastUrlPathSegment) {
  case 'ecommerce':
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
  break;
  case 'global':
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
  break;
  case 'saas':
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'flex';
  break;
  default:
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
}


// << SOLUTIONS PAGE - SHOW RELEVANT LOGO GROUP BY URL PATH (Variant must be "Base")


// Duplicate logo group
const customerLogosMarqueeGroup = document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-group');
const clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup = customerLogosMarqueeGroup.cloneNode(true);
clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup.id = 'clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup';
customerLogosMarqueeGroup.parentNode.insertBefore(clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup, customerLogosMarqueeGroup);


</script>

<style>

.v3_customer-logos-marquee-group {
  animation: marquee 75s linear infinite;
}

.v3_customer-logos-marquee-group.small {
  animation: marquee 140s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes marquee {
  0% {
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
  100% {
    transform: translateX(calc(-100% - 5rem));
  }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {

  
  .v3_customer-logos-marquee-wrapper:not(.small) .v3_customer-logos-marquee-group img {
    height: 1.125rem;
  }

}

</style>


<script>


// >> SOLUTIONS PAGE - SHOW RELEVANT LOGO GROUP BY URL PATH (Variant must be "Base")
const urlPathSegments = window.location.pathname.split("/").filter(segment => segment !== "");
const lastUrlPathSegment = urlPathSegments[urlPathSegments.length - 1];

switch(lastUrlPathSegment) {
  case 'ecommerce':
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
  break;
  case 'global':
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
  break;
  case 'saas':
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'flex';
  break;
  default:
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
}


// << SOLUTIONS PAGE - SHOW RELEVANT LOGO GROUP BY URL PATH (Variant must be "Base")


// Duplicate logo group
const customerLogosMarqueeGroup = document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-group');
const clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup = customerLogosMarqueeGroup.cloneNode(true);
clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup.id = 'clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup';
customerLogosMarqueeGroup.parentNode.insertBefore(clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup, customerLogosMarqueeGroup);


</script>

data.html:
Let the results speak for themselves.

Read story

Numeral tailors its solution to each clients needs. Everything is customized. And I loved that I could talk to sales tax experts. Numeral guarantees no compliance mistakes will happen. Nobody else was willing to make that promise.

Jason Wong
Founder, Doe Lashes
Read story

We had many issues with TaxJar, including incorrect tax filings that resulted in an overpayment of $5,700 and non-existent customer support. Numeral provided complete onboarding, prompt customer service, and rapid feature additions based on customer input.

Kevin Chanthasiriphan
Founder, immi
Read story

I was spending way too many hours every month on sales tax. Numeral has made it easy to identify and know the tax laws. And then, on your behalf, registering and managing everything takes the worry off my plate.

Jesse Hiss
Founder, Fresh Sends
Read story

It's set it and forget it. At the end of the day, I'd much rather spend time growing our business than worrying about sales tax. We love Numeral. I don't know how you squeeze a number out of it, but I'd give working with them a 10 out of 10.

Adrian Zhang
Co-founder, The Woobles
Read story

Numeral worked with us to figure out where we stood at the time and where we should be. They ensured that we were a compliant business and doing everything correctly. It's set it and forget it.

Tom Phillips
Co-founder, Bro Glo

data.html:
Monitor and register

Identify where you have tax liability and automatically register when you exceed a threshold or establish nexus.

Learn more

File and remit

Returns are prepared and payments are madeon time, every time. Detailed reporting and filing history are just a click away.

Learn more

Calculate and collect

Use the Numeral Tax API to integrate tax calculation with your billing platform or custom checkout.

Learn more

Manage exemptions

Protect your business and prove compliance during audits by verifying your customers exemption certificates.

Learn more

Virtual mailboxes

We scan, read, and respond to all your sales tax mail from state and local governments.

Our guarantee

We guarantee your sales tax is filed on time, or well pay your penalties and interest charges.

White glove support

Expert guidance every step of the way. Chat with us, send an email, or give us a call anytime.

Simple pricing

No long-term contract needed. You'll pay for registration and filing.

Simple integrations and end-to-end tax support as your business grows.

Let the results speak for themselves.

Read story

Numeral tailors its solution to each clients needs. Everything is customized. And I loved that I could talk to sales tax experts. Numeral guarantees no compliance mistakes will happen. Nobody else was willing to make that promise.

Jason Wong
Founder, Doe Lashes
Read story

We had many issues with TaxJar, including incorrect tax filings that resulted in an overpayment of $5,700 and non-existent customer support. Numeral provided complete onboarding, prompt customer service, and rapid feature additions based on customer input.

Kevin Chanthasiriphan
Founder, immi
Read story

I was spending way too many hours every month on sales tax. Numeral has made it easy to identify and know the tax laws. And then, on your behalf, registering and managing everything takes the worry off my plate.

Jesse Hiss
Founder, Fresh Sends
Read story

It's set it and forget it. At the end of the day, I'd much rather spend time growing our business than worrying about sales tax. We love Numeral. I don't know how you squeeze a number out of it, but I'd give working with them a 10 out of 10.

Adrian Zhang
Co-founder, The Woobles
Read story

Numeral worked with us to figure out where we stood at the time and where we should be. They ensured that we were a compliant business and doing everything correctly. It's set it and forget it.

Co-founder, Bro Glo

data.html:
Monitor and register

Identify where you have tax liability and automatically register when you exceed a threshold or establish nexus.

Learn more

File and remit

Returns are prepared and payments are madeon time, every time. Detailed reporting and filing history are just a click away.

Learn more

Calculate and collect

Use the Numeral Tax API to integrate tax calculation with your billing platform or custom checkout.

Learn more

Manage exemptions

Protect your business and prove compliance during audits by verifying your customers exemption certificates.

Learn more

Virtual mailboxes

We scan, read, and respond to all your sales tax mail from state and local governments.

Our guarantee

We guarantee your sales tax is filed on time, or well pay your penalties and interest charges.

White glove support

Expert guidance every step of the way. Chat with us, send an email, or give us a call anytime.

Simple pricing

No long-term contract needed. You'll pay for registration and filing.

Simple integrations and end-to-end tax support as your business grows.

<style>

.v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
  border: 1px solid var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-warm-500);
  border-radius: 0.75rem;
  background:  var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  display: flex;
  height: 2.875rem;
  padding: .1875rem;
  position: relative;
}

.v3_footer .v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
  border: none;
  background: var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field {
  position: relative;
  max-width: 65%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field .input {
  max-width: 100%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field > label {
  display: none;
}


.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input {
  color: var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-iron-600);
  background: transparent;
  border: none;
  margin-bottom: 0;
  font-family: var(--v3-fonts--twk-continental);
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 400;
  line-height: 140%;
  padding: 0 1rem;
  field-sizing: content;
  max-width: 100%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input::selection {
  background: black;
}

.v3_footer-cta .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input {
  color: var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-iron-600);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input:focus-visible {
  outline: none;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-error-msgs {
  position: absolute;
  background: #ff3100cf;
  top: 3rem;
  left: 0;
  z-index: 1000;
  width: max-content;
  padding: 0.75rem;
  list-style: none;
  border-radius: 0.5rem;
  margin: 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  grid-row-gap: 0.25rem;
  box-shadow: 5px 5px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.25);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-error-msg {
  background: transparent;
  font-family: var(--v3-fonts--twk-continental);
  font-size: 0.825rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #fff;
  padding: 0;
  border: none;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs_error_rollup {
  position: absolute;
  top: 150%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit {
  background-color: var(--v3-colors--v3-orange-700);
  height: 100%;
  border-radius: .5rem;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  box-shadow: 0px 1px 3px 0px rgba(10, 13, 18, 0.10), 0px 1px 2px -1px rgba(10, 13, 18, 0.10);
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit:hover {
  background-color: var(--v3-colors--v3-orange-800);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit:active {
  box-shadow: none;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit .actions {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit input {
  background: transparent;
  border: none;
  font-family: var(--v3-fonts--twk-continental);
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
  white-space: nowrap;
  width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
  padding: 0 1rem;
  cursor: pointer;
}


.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill,
.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill:hover, 
.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill:focus, 
.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill:active {
  transition: background-color 5000s;
  -webkit-text-fill-color: var(--white) !important;
}


.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs_error_rollup {
  display: none !important;
}

@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {

	.v3_email-collect-form-embed {
    width: 100%;
  }
  
 .v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
  	border: none;
  	background: transparent;
	}
  
  .v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
    flex-direction: column;
    grid-row-gap: 0.75rem;
    height: max-content;
    border: none;
    padding: 0;
    border-radius: 0;
  }
  
  .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field, .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input {
    text-align: center;
  }
  
  .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field {
    width: 100%;
    height: 2.75rem;
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    border: 1px solid var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-warm-500);
    border-radius: 0.5rem;
    background: var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
    max-width: 100%;
  }
  
  .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit {
    height: 2.75rem;
    width: 100%;
  }

}


</style>

<script>
  hbspt.forms.create({
    portalId: "39949294",
    formId: "7c6aefad-be41-466e-9cdb-38a4d3786439",
		onFormReady: function () {
      // Remove asterisk from placeholder:
      $('input[name="email"]').attr("placeholder", "Enter your work email");

			// April 1st changes:
			const pageSlug = document.querySelector('html').getAttribute('data-wf-item-slug');
      if(pageSlug == 'global') {
      	document.cookie = "enteringPage=global; path=/";
      }
    }
  });
</script>
